featured.text: As India’s size decreases, the thickness of the Himalayas increases.
It gives the older trees a certain kind of protection from insects, but the main benefit is that it keeps the center of the tree intact from moderate forest fires because of its thickness.
He had a glassmaker create thirty-seven hemispheres made of glass, with each being a different size and thickness to produce different pitches.

definition.zh_def: 厚度，指物體的厚面或層的距離。
definition.en_def: The measurement of how thick an object is.
definition.example: The thickness of the book made it difficult to fit on the shelf.
